rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKC2110} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit applies a market focus to the process of analysis and strategy development. Using marketing planning as a framework, the contribution of marketing strategies to the attainment of firm goals is explored.
